thread.title: Hopkinton-based EMC could be acquired by Dell - Business news
thread.title_full: Hopkinton-based EMC could be acquired by Dell - Business news

author: boston.com
title: Hopkinton-based EMC could be acquired by Dell - Business news
text:
Dell Inc. is in talks to buy EMC, the Hopkinton-based company that specializes in data storage, people briefed on the matter told The New York Times .
The deal could be reached within the week, and would involve mostly cash, according to The Times .
 A takeover of EMC would answer years of questions about the fate of the 36-year-old company, which has grown from data storage into a collection of businesses, including network security and content management for corporate clients.
EMC previously discussed a merger with Hewlett-Packard, but talks fell apart.
Read the full New York Times article here .
